allow: Bash(curl -s "https://srv106163.seohost.com.pl/graphql" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{""query"":""{ page\(id: \\""strona-glowna\\"", idType: URI\) { title content featuredImage { node { sourceUrl } } } }""}')

Bash(powershell -NoProfile -Command "$body = @{query = ''{ page\(id: ""strona-glowna"", idType: URI\) { title content featuredImage { node { sourceUrl } } } }''} | ConvertTo-Json; $r = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri ''https://srv106163.seohost.com.pl/graphql'' -Method POST -ContentType ''application/json'' -Body $body; $r.data.page | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 10")
